processSteps.step1Desc: Discuss your business vision, goals, and requirements. We'll analyze your needs and recommend the optimal business structure and jurisdiction.

processSteps.step3Desc: Track your application progress in real-time. We coordinate with all relevant authorities to obtain approvals and complete registration.
processSteps.step4Desc: Receive your licenses and begin operations. We provide continuous support for compliance, renewals, and business growth.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about business setup in Bahrain and Saudi Arabia.
faq.q1: What are the requirements for company formation in Bahrain and Saudi Arabia?
faq.a1: Requirements vary by jurisdiction and business type. Generally, you'll need valid passports, proposed business names, a registered address, and a business plan. For Bahrain, 100% foreign ownership is allowed for most sectors. In Saudi Arabia, the requirements depend on your business activity. We guide you through all specific requirements for your situation.
faq.q2: How long does the business setup process take?
faq.a2: The typical timeline is 3-6 weeks, depending on the jurisdiction, business type, and complexity. Express services are available for faster processing. We provide clear timelines upfront and keep you informed at every stage.
faq.q3: Can foreigners own 100% of a company in Bahrain and Saudi Arabia?
faq.a3: Yes, Bahrain allows 100% foreign ownership for most business sectors. Saudi Arabia also permits 100% foreign ownership for most activities under the new investment regulations. Some restricted sectors may require local partnership, which we can help structure appropriately.
faq.q4: What types of business licenses are available?
faq.a4: We can help you obtain commercial, industrial, service, tourism, and professional licenses. The specific license depends on your business activities. We assess your needs and recommend the most suitable license type for your operations.
faq.q5: Do you provide office space and business address services?
faq.a5: Yes, we offer flexible solutions including virtual offices, serviced offices, and assistance in finding permanent office space. A registered business address is mandatory for company formation, and we can provide this as part of our service packages.
faq.q6: What ongoing support do you provide after company formation?
faq.a6: We offer comprehensive post-formation support including annual license renewals, visa processing, accounting services, compliance management, and business advisory. Our relationship doesn't end at registration â€“ we're your long-term partner for success in the Gulf.
faq.q7: What are the costs involved in setting up a business?
faq.a7: Costs vary depending on business type, location, and services required. In Bahrain, basic company formation starts from BHD 800, while Saudi Arabia packages typically start from SAR 15,000. This includes government fees, registration costs, and our service fees. We provide detailed cost breakdowns during consultation with no hidden charges.
faq.q8: Do I need to be physically present during the setup process?
faq.a8: Physical presence requirements vary by jurisdiction. For Bahrain, initial presence may be required for bank account opening and biometric registration. Saudi Arabia often requires presence for final documentation. However, we minimize your time commitment through efficient scheduling and can handle most procedures with power of attorney.
faq.q9: What banking options are available for my business?
faq.a9: We work with all major banks in Bahrain and Saudi Arabia including local and international institutions. Options include multi-currency accounts, online banking facilities, and merchant services. We assist with the entire account opening process and help you choose the bank that best fits your business needs.
faq.q10: How does VAT compliance work in Bahrain and Saudi Arabia?
faq.a10: Bahrain implemented 10% VAT in 2019, while Saudi Arabia has 15% VAT. We assist with VAT registration, filing returns, and ongoing compliance. Our team ensures you meet all tax obligations and can connect you with qualified accountants for comprehensive tax planning and management.
faq.q11: Can I hire international employees for my company?
faq.a11: Yes, both Bahrain and Saudi Arabia allow hiring international employees. We handle work permit applications, visa processing, and ensure compliance with labor regulations including Saudization requirements in Saudi Arabia. We guide you through quota systems, salary requirements, and all employment documentation.
faq.q12: What happens if I want to close or transfer my business?
faq.a12: We assist with business closure procedures including license cancellation, employee settlements, and final clearances from government authorities. For business transfers, we manage the entire ownership transfer process, ensuring legal compliance and smooth transition. Exit procedures typically take 2-4 weeks depending on business complexity.

about.heroTitle: About BahrainSetup - Your Gateway to Gulf Business Success
about.heroSubtitle: Since 2016, we've been the trusted partner for international entrepreneurs and businesses expanding into Bahrain and Saudi Arabia. With over 500 successful company formations and an expert team fluent in both markets, we transform complex regulatory processes into seamless business launches.
about.heroDescription: Specialized in complete end-to-end business setup services including company registration, licensing, visa processing, and ongoing compliance management across the GCC region.
about.missionText: To empower entrepreneurs and businesses to establish their presence in the Gulf region by providing comprehensive, transparent, and efficient company formation services that ensure 100% foreign ownership and full regulatory compliance.
about.visionText: To be the leading business setup consultancy in the Gulf region, recognized for our unparalleled expertise, unwavering integrity, and proven track record in helping international businesses thrive.
